source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_00<tab>Kal Myhk looks to be in a state of panic.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_00<tab>不浄の三塔付近のカル・ミークはとても慌てているようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_01<tab>Kal Myhk tells you his brother has been seriously injured. In the hopes of promoting a swift recovery, he wishes to keep his brother well fed. To that end, he asks that you help him hunt for food. Meet with Kal Myhk down at the river and be ready to hunt.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_01<tab>カル・ミークと話した。怪我をした同族のために、狩りに協力してほしいと頼まれた。高地ドラヴァニアのウィロームリバーで、「カル・ミーク」と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_02<tab>Kal Myhk plans to bring his brother both jagil and loaghtan meat, and needs your help. The loaghtans are known to graze up north, but he is forbidden from traveling so far upstream. He asks that you hunt one in his stead.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_02<tab>カル・ミークと合流した。ウィロームリバーの「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9C0E01 /var>」で見渡し、現れた「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20FD301 /var>」を討伐して、食糧となる肉を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_03<tab>You slay a loaghtan and obtain its meat. Return south with your bounty and report your success to Kal Myhk.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B5A01 /var>を入手した。ウィロームリバーにいる「カル・ミーク」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_04<tab>Kal Myhk is quite pleased with your kill. With meat and fish in hand, he insists on going straight to his brother in Mourn.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_04<tab>カル・ミークに報告した。高地ドラヴァニアのモーン大岩窟に向かった「カル・ミーク」と再び合流し、そこで「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B5A01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_05<tab>You arrive at Mourn and find Kal Myhk but a few steps inside. Next to him is his brother, lying motionless on the floor. Kal Myhk rouses him and offers him the fish and meat you procured. His brother refuses, and becoming aware of your presence, grows increasingly angry at the offering. He recalls the men who plucked him from the skies of Coerthas, nearly claiming his life. He warns Kal Myhk that no man can be trusted, and claims that you too will soon turn to betray him. Kal Myhk is at a loss for words, and quickly leaves the cave to consider his brother's words. Seek Kal Myhk near Anyx Trine, and see how he is handling this news.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_05<tab>カル・ミークに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B5A01 /var>を渡したが、オル・アースには食べてもらえなかった。怪我をさせたのがヒトの騎兵だと聞き、カル・ミークは恐れを抱いてしまったようだ。高地ドラヴァニアの不浄の三塔付近に戻り、「カル・ミーク」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_06<tab>You find Kal Myhk on the steps of Anyx Trine, a sullen look on his face. While he appreciates all you have done for him, it seems he would choose to heed his brother's warning.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_06<tab>カル・ミークと話した。カル・ミークは、オル・アースから聞いた話に、まだ動揺しているようだが……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_TODO_01<tab>Hunt a loaghtan at the specified location.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9C0E01 /var>で見渡し、現れた<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20FD301 /var>から肉を入手

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_TODO_03<tab>Hand Kal Myhk the slice of loaghtan shoulder.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_TODO_03<tab>カル・ミークに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B5A01 /var>を渡す

TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_000あっ！　)) (( )) 02 /var>！
たいへんだよ、助けて助けて！！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_001<tab>Brother has been gravely injured. I fear he will not survive long in such a weakened state.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_001いつも遊んでくれてる、知り合いのにいちゃんが、
すごいケガをして帰ってきたんだよ～！
なんだか、あまり元気もなさそうだし……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_002<tab>He must feed to regain his strength. Meet me at the river. We will gather food for him.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_002元気になるには、おなかいっぱい食べるのが一番だよ！
だから、ごはんをたっくさん集めてあげようと思うんだ！
ボクも狩りをするから、)) (( )) 02 /var>も手伝ってよ！

TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_003先に、こないだの川のそばに行ってるから、
)) (( )) 02 /var>も来てね！　待ってるからね！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_010<tab>Good, you are here. Let us hunt jagil and loaghtan. They are Brother's favorite, and easy prey besides.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_010よーし、じゃあさっそく始めよーう！
「グナースの塚」のそばに、がいるはずだから、
)) (( )) 02 /var>は、そいつの「おにく」をお願い！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_011<tab>The loaghtans graze north of here, but I am forbidden from traveling so far upstream. You must hunt one for me. I will remain here and hunt the jagil. Go swiftly.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_011ボク、川の向こうには行っちゃダメだって言われてるから、
このあたりで、狩りをすることにするよ！
じゃ、おねがいね！　がんばるぞ～、オーッ！！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_020<tab>They're known to graze to the north. Stay along the river, and look for one there.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_020「グナースの塚」のそばに、がいるはずだから、
)) (( )) 02 /var>は、そいつの「おにく」をお願い！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_030<tab>You hunt well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Good work. I too have caught a veritable bounty.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_030おぉ、を狩れたみたいだね！
さっすが)) (( )) 02 /var>！
ボクも、狩り、ちゃんとしてきたよ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_031<tab>Quickly, let us take these to Brother. He rests just beyond the mouth of Mourn outside Anyx Trine.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_031よしっ、さっそく、にいちゃんに持っていこ～う！
にいちゃんは、「モーン大岩窟」ってトコにいるんだ！
先に行ってるから、「おにく」はそっちでちょうだいね！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_040<tab>Give me the loaghtan meat. I will feed it to him.
TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_041<tab>Brother! I bring you food. Eat, and regain your strength.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_041オルにいちゃん、これあげる！
にいちゃんのすきな、「おにく」だよ！
たくさんあるから、おなかいっぱい食べて元気になってね！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_OHLASH_000_042<tab>Kal, my brother. These wounds will not be mended by food. I must rest to─ Wait! Who is that with you? ...A man!? Why do you consort with this filth? Were these beasts slain by <var 08 E905 ((<var 1A 02 /var>her<var 1A 01 /var>)) ((<var 1A 02 /var>his<var 1A 01 /var>)) /var> hand?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_OHLASH_000_042……いいか、カル、肉を食べても怪我は治らねぇ。
ゆっくり寝て、体力を回復させるのが……って、おい。
まさか、そのヒトが獲った肉ではないだろうな？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_OHLASH_000_043<tab>I will not demean myself by eating meat butchered by this creature. Who do you think dealt me these wounds but <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> kind!?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_OHLASH_000_043そんなもん、食えるわけねぇだろ！
この怪我、誰にやられたと思ってるんだ！？
……ヒトの騎兵どもにやられたんだぞ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_OHLASH_000_044<tab>We hunt for food, for the survival of our kind. But they hunt for blood─striking without hesitation, assuming all of our kind to be their enemy. Men howled and cheered as I fell into the snows of Coerthas. I was fortunate to escape with my life.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_OHLASH_000_044俺は獲物を追って、クルザスに行っただけなのに……
ヒトどもめ、狩りをしていた俺を襲ってきやがったんだ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_OHLASH_000_045<tab>Men cannot be trusted. <var 1A 02 /var>None of them<var 1A 01 /var>! It is only a matter of time before even <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> turns on you.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_OHLASH_000_045カルよ、ヒトなんかとつるむのは、今すぐやめろ！
そいつだって、いつお前のことを襲うかわからねぇぞ！？
くっそ……傷が痛むぜ、まったく……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_046<tab>But <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has been so kind to me. I don't understand...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_046……えっ、そうなの？
ヒトって……やっぱりこわい生き物なの……？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_047<tab>Excuse me. I... I need time to think on Brother's words.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_047そ、そういえば、
ボク、友だちと遊ぶ約束をしてた気が……。
…………じゃ、じゃあね……。
TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_OHLASH_000_051<tab>てめぇ……カルに手を出そうだなんて、思うなよ！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_050<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I have given thought to Brother's words, and... I'm sorry. You have been very kind, but he would not lie to me. I must ask that you leave.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_050あっ、)) (( )) 02 /var>……。
またオルにいちゃんに怒られるし、それに……。
「おにく」、どうもありがとうね……。
